bug.short_desc: Add more unit tests for core classes

long_desc.thetext:
We checked the code coverage recently and saw some classes having poor coverage. Here is a list of classes we think could use some more testing. 100% coverage should not be the target but around 70% could be a good value for most classes.
framework/source/class/qx/application/Mobile: 8 % framework/source/class/qx/application/Scaling: 10.71 % framework/source/class/qx/Mixin: 58.47 % framework/source/class/qx/core/Environment: 47.37 % framework/source/class/qx/core/Init: 12 % framework/source/class/qx/core/ObjectRegistry: 23.53 % framework/source/class/qx/core/Wrapper: 8.7 % framework/source/class/qx/data/MBinding: 28.57 % framework/source/class/qx/data/store/Yql: 40 %

Fixed in next#master with a3ab8980fe5d5b1a18cf7a0503f93d31cdb066c0
framework/source/class/qx/application/Mobile: 75,86% framework/source/class/qx/application/Scaling: 100% framework/source/class/qx/Mixin: 84,48% framework/source/class/qx/core/ObjectRegistry: 73,08% framework/source/class/qx/core/Wrapper: 100% framework/source/class/qx/data/MBinding: 100% framework/source/class/qx/data/store/Yql: External service -> Removed
I didn't figure out how to reach LOC after looking in this._checks in framework/source/class/qx/core/Environment:614
